name: Ghost House Evil Shooter
description:
Epic evil shooter, Escape safely from house & crack the secret of ghost house, use everything you find to survive. Persisting here will be not an easy and simple task. Only you can escape this ghost house to become an ultimate evil shooter. Play this ghost house evil shooter mission and get ready to find tools and assets that would help you in a survival escape mission. Survive the hazards of dark evil ghost house and escape the evil mansion using killer skills. Keep gathering hints and battery for light to endure. This Ghost House is dark and empty with no resident to be seen anywhere. Do not let your fear tired you and arrive at your home before getting late for everything. If you like horror game with surprising twists you will love this adventure game. There are many frightful actions at the ghost house of rivals. This ghost house evil shooter game is very engaging and challenging.

Ghost house evil shooter is an ​adventure game where you have to find the book from a mysterious ghost house and break out from a series of rooms by using hints and items. An all-new survival escape missions for the survival game lovers filled with horror and supernatural activities. If he catches you, he will kill you. Survival in this wilderness is hard-hitting. You are an evil shooter, escape from blood killer with magical powers. Your mission involves lifting up the curse from the neighborhood and getting rid of the evil ghosts. Breakout from this mysterious evil village of horror residence and neighbors with the monster assassin. The survival mission involves finding the clues to escape and survive. Ghost House Evil Shooter adventure is about to begin in this survival game. Your colony survival is only possible if you win the battle by hunting jungle creatures and monstrous livings.

Key Features:
- Haunted Ghost House
- Interesting Levels & Game Play
- Smooth and intuitive controls
-Stunning & High-Quality​ 3D Graphics
-Thrilling and Challenging Missions
